sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> with the <radical>old</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> is the one who has said many things. That makes them different from everyone, an <kanji>individual</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine that leader's old mouth saying things that make the old man stand apart from the others. They are individual from everyone else.
readingMnemonic: As an <kanji>individual</kanji>, one must teach all the <ja><reading>子</reading></ja>s (<ja>こ</ja>) their way. Their individual way.
readingInfo: "You must be your own individual. Don't be a sheeple," he says to the <ja>子</ja>s.
